data.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
data.quote: No one is dumb who is curious. The people who don't ask questions remain clueless throughout their lives.

data.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
data.quote: The most creative people are motivated by the grandest of problems that are presented before them.

data.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
data.quote: I know of no time in human history where ignorance was better than knowledge.

data.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
data.quote: Kids should be allowed to break stuff more often. That's a consequence of exploration. Exploration is what you do when you don't know what you're doing. That's what scientists do every day.

data.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
data.quote: I don't want people to say, 'Something is true because Tyson says it is true.' That's not critical thinking.

data.author: Mike Ormsby
data.quote: I'm not interested in whether I'm better than you; only whether I'm better than yesterday.

data.author: Nelson Mandela
data.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

data.author: Kwame Nkrumah
data.quote: The forces that unite us are intrinsic and greater than the superimposed influences that keep us apart.

data.author: Chinua Achebe
data.quote: Art is man's constant effort to create for himself a different order of reality from that which is given to him.

data.author: Chinua Achebe
data.quote: One of the truest tests of integrity is its blunt refusal to be compromised.

data.author: Chinua Achebe
data.quote: A man who makes trouble for others is also making trouble for himself.

data.author: Alexander Hamilton
data.quote: Those who stand for nothing fall for everything.

data.author: Ken Robinson
data.quote: If you're not prepared to be wrong, you'll never come up with anything original.

data.author: Ken Robinson
data.quote: Creativity is as important as literacy.

data.author: Ken Robinson
data.quote: For most of us the problem isn’t that we aim too high and fail - it’s just the opposite - we aim too low and succeed.

data.author: Ken Robinson
data.quote: What you do for yourself dies with you when you leave this world, what you do for others lives on forever.

data.author: Albus Dumbledore
data.quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.

data.author: J. R. R. Tolkien
data.quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.

data.author: Charles Xavier
data.quote: Just because someone stumbles and loses their path, doesn't mean they're lost forever.

data.author: John Skoll
data.quote: Someone, at some point, came up with this very bad idea that an ordinary individual couldn't make a difference in the world. I think that's just a horrible thing.

data.author: Susan Cain
data.quote: There's zero correlation between being the best talker and having the best ideas.

data.author: Maya Angelou
data.quote: You can only become truly accomplished at something you love. Don't make money your goal. Instead, pursue the things you love doing, and then do them so well that people can't take their eyes off you.

data.author: Nigel Marsh
data.quote: There are thousands and thousands of people out there leading lives of quiet, screaming desperation, where they work long, hard hours at jobs they hate to enable them to buy things they don't need to impress people they don't like.
